videos.title: Disease model from scratch
videos.short_description: Let's create a simple infectious disease model from scratch.

videos.title: Forest fire model from scratch
videos.short_description: Learn how to use patches to model the spread of a forest fire.

videos.title: Information spread over a network
videos.short_description: Create a network of turtles in NetLogo and move information over it.

videos.title: Exploring the Models Library
videos.short_description: NetLogo's Models Library is an invaluable resource. Learn how to access it.
